title: Sound On: Russia's Donbas Offensive, Biden Approval
itunes:title: Sound On: Russia's Donbas Offensive, Biden Approval
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.
Guests: Congressman Ruben Gallego of Arizona, Dante Scala, political science professor at the University of New Hampshire, and Bloomberg politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
